title: Los Angeles
additional-note: The first renewal we have found filed that specifically mentions Los Angeles magazine is for a contribution published in the August 1973 issue.  However, copyrights for earlier contributions from 1964 onward in any issue with copyright notices could also have been automatically renewed. We do not know if copyright notices were included in the magazine from the beginning, or were introduced at a later date.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Nat Bender for copyright research on this title.
